actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow for a temporary period a deduction equal to the increase in residential electricity expenses occurring after January 1, 1973.

summary.text: Allows a tax deduction under the Internal Revenue Code equal to the increase in residential electricity expenses occurring after January 1, 1973. Terminates the tax deduction provided under this Act after December 31, 1978.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow for a temporary period a deduction equal to the increase in residential electricity expenses occurring after January 1, 1973.
